func.title: SetAnimationPosition

param.name: animation_number
param.desc: Animation number of the animation whose position to set.

param.name: position
param.desc: Specifies how to compute the position of the animation. The value needs to be created with one of the "Anim_" animation functions.

param.name: attach_number
param.desc: If given, refers to the number of the attached mesh whose animation to change.

func.desc: Sets a new position for the given animation. Returns true if the new AVP was set or false if there is no such animation with the given number or the number refers to a combination node.
func.remark: See the animation documentation for further explanations of the animation system.

example.text: Script for a timer: For each call the animation is advanced by 100 milliseconds. If the timer is called periodically in same intervals Anim_Linear can be used instead.
